description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; alteration to external elevations involving replacement of two rear ground floor windows and single door with one pair of glazed doors
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:
Application form; EXISTING 2nd FLOOR PLAN (Drawing number: 0674 - 003); EXISTING 1st FLOOR PLAN (Drawing number: 0674 - 002); EXISTING SITE BLOCK PLAN AND SITE LOCATION PLAN

(Drawing number: 0674 - 004); EXISTING SECTION E (Drawing number: 0674 - 006); PROPOSED G FLOOR PLAN (Drawing number: 0674 - 101); PROPOSED 1st FLOOR PLAN (Drawing number: 0674 - 102); EXISTING G FLOOR AND CELLARPLANS (Drawing number: 0674 - 001); PROPOSED 2nd FLOOR PLAN (Drawing number: 0674 - 103); PROPOSED SECTION E (Drawing number: 0674 - 106); EXISTING SITE BLOCK PLAN AND SITE LOCATION PLAN (Drawing number: 0674 - 004); EXISTING ELEVATIONS (Drawing number: 0674 - 005); PROPOSED ELEVATIONS (Drawing number: 0674 - 105 - A);

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
